summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Strategic Planning Office; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 2001 Budget of the Executive Department's Strategic Planning Office for spending additional grant funds provided by the State of Washington Department of Community, Trade and Economic Development for compliance with the requirements of RCW 36.70A.215; accepting those additional grant funds made available in 2001; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Supplemental Appropriations Account of the Emergency Subfund; all by three-fourths vote of the City Council.
